prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan when she traveled to Munich, from Michigan, with her then husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's older cousin.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan when she traveled to Munich, from Michigan, with her then husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's older cousin.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What were Stefan's true thoughts, feelings, and reactions when I stepped off the S-Bahn the morning of September 20th, 2024?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a compiled list of all relevant chart data extracted from your horary chart, organized by category and following strict horary analysis principles:

1. Planetary Positions and Degrees
• Sun: 12°25′ Aquarius (located in the 5th House, along with Mercury and Pluto)
• Moon: 15°37′ Pisces (located in the 7th House, together with Venus, Saturn, Neptune, and North Node)
• Mercury: 6°27′ Aquarius (in the 5th House; also noted in a conjunction with Pluto at 4° orb with additional aspects involving the MC)
• Venus: 27°28′ Pisces (situated in the 7th House; in close conjunction with Neptune and North Node, with additional sextile to Uranus and Pluto)
• Mars: 20°26′ Cancer (reversed, positioned in the 11th House; aspects include square with Chiron and sextile to Uranus, trine to Saturn, and trine to Neptune)
• Jupiter: 11°17′ Gemini (reversed, in the 10th House; aspect patterns include square to Ascendant, opposition to IC, conjunction with MC, and trine/square with other key placements)
• Saturn: 17°25′ Pisces (in the 7th House; involved in aspects such as Moon conjunction and trine with Mars, opposition to Ascendant, and square with Jupiter)
• Uranus: 23°15′ Taurus (in the 9th House; sextile to Neptune and Venus, and involved in the Mars sextile aspect)
• Neptune: 27°58′ Pisces (in the 7th House; forms a conjunction with Venus and North Node, and is part of several other aspects)
• Pluto: 2°03′ Aquarius (in the 5th House; forms a sextile to North Node, trine to MC, and aspects with Mercury and Venus)
• North Node: 29°51′ Pisces (reversed, in the 7th House; conjoined with Neptune and Venus and sextiled by Pluto)
• Chiron: 19°30′ Aries (located in the 8th House; involved in a square with Mars)
• Ascendant: 10°24′ Virgo (chart’s 1st House; represents Melissa Gale in this horary query)
• Midheaven (MC): 6°41′ Gemini (in the chart’s 10th House)
• Imum Coeli (IC): 6°41′ Sagittarius (in the chart’s 4th House)

2. Aspect Summary (with key orbs noted)
• Mercury sextile IC (0° orb)
• MC opposition IC (0° orb)
• Venus conjunct Neptune (0° orb)
• Mercury trine MC (0° orb)
• Jupiter square Ascendant (1° orb)
• Mars square Chiron (1° orb)
• Sun trine Jupiter (1° orb)
• Neptune conjunct North Node (2° orb)
• Venus conjunct North Node (2° orb)
• Moon conjunct Saturn (2° orb)
• Pluto sextile North Node (3° orb)
• Mars sextile Uranus (3° orb)
• Mars trine Saturn (3° orb)
• Pluto sextile IC (4° orb)
• Uranus sextile Neptune (4° orb)
• Venus sextile Uranus (4° orb)
• Ascendant square IC (4° orb)
• Ascendant square MC (4° orb)
• Moon square Jupiter (4° orb)
• Mercury conjunct Pluto (4° orb)
• Pluto trine MC (4° orb)
• Venus sextile Pluto (5° orb)
• Jupiter opposition IC (5° orb)
• Moon opposition Ascendant (5° orb)
• Jupiter conjunct MC (5° orb)
• Mercury trine Jupiter (5° orb)
• Moon trine Mars (5° orb)
• Saturn sextile Uranus (6° orb)
• Sun sextile IC (6° orb)
• Jupiter square Saturn (6° orb)
• Sun conjunct Mercury (6° orb)
• Sun trine MC (6° orb)
• Saturn opposition Ascendant (7° orb)
• Mars trine Neptune (7° orb)
• Venus trine Mars (7° orb)

3. Aspectual Patterns and Special Configurations
• Two T-Squares identified:
  – T-Square involving MC (6° Gemini), Ascendant (10° Virgo), and IC (6° Sagittarius) with Jupiter in 11° Gemini.
  – T-Square involving Ascendant (10° Virgo), Jupiter (11° Gemini), and Saturn (17° Pisces) with Moon (15° Pisces).
• Most frequent aspect types: Trines and Sextiles (totaling 9 occurrences)
• MC involved in 10 different aspects, emphasizing its significance in this chart.
• The chart forms a Bowl shape overall.
• The Air element is dominant among the inner planets, while the inner planets avoid Fire signs.
• The Mutable modality is dominant among the inner planets.
• Most planets are positioned in the upper right quadrant of the chart.
• Moon and Saturn are in a descending motion.
• Jupiter sits on the Midheaven, and the IC occupies the Nadir.
• Neptune in Pisces acts as the sole dispositor in the chart.

4. House Placements and Cross-Reference for Stefan’s Representation
• Ascendant (10°24′ Virgo) represents you, Melissa Gale.
• Stefan is indicated by the Chart’s 6th House (which according to the provided cross-reference corresponds to his 9th house in his own chart).
  – Note: This means any significant planetary placements, aspects, or conditions in the Chart’s 6th House (and those aspects affecting it) are especially relevant for interpreting Stefan’s thoughts, feelings, and reactions regarding the query.

5. Additional Contextual Data
• The Moon was a waxing crescent at the time of the query, an indicator used in horary for the evolving nature of emotional responses.
• Timing indicators and any transit overlays would be referenced against these positions, but the provided data represents the static horary snapshot.
• The dominant elements and aspects (especially those bridging the Ascendant and the Chart’s 6th House) will be further examined in relation to Stefan’s inner state.

This listing of positions, aspects, patterns, and house placements is the comprehensive extracted data from your provided horary chart per established horary principles. Additional interpretations will require correlating these data points—especially the link between the Ascendant (you) and the Chart’s 6th House for Stefan—to reveal his subconscious reactions as recorded at the moment of the query.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the provided horary chart, your Ascendant represents you while Stefan is indicated by the chart’s 6th house. The ruling of the 6th house falls to Uranus, placed in Taurus in the 9th house, which shows him connected to matters of foreign influence and sudden change. The following points summarize his state:

• Uranus, as his house ruler, is positioned favorably and in harmonious aspects—sextile to both Mars and Neptune and further supported by Venus. This configuration suggests that his internal response was marked by an unexpected jolt of energy and a spark of intrigue. There is a sudden, almost electric, impulse triggered by your appearance.

• Mars forming a sextile with Uranus indicates that the activation was swift and impulsive. This shows that his reaction was instinctual and stirred feelings that were energetic and provocative. There may have been a surge of adrenaline or a visceral recognition of something significant in your presence.

• Venus and Neptune, conjoined in the 7th house and involving the North Node, lend a subtle layer of attraction and emotional vulnerability to the reading. His inner response mixed aesthetic admiration or a latent desire with dreamlike expectations, even if it was not fully recognized or openly expressed.

• However, Saturn in the 7th house, which is strongly linked to restrictions and commitments, combined with challenging aspects to the Ascendant (opposition at 7° orb) and Jupiter’s square to the Ascendant, introduces inhibition. Despite the immediate spark, there is an undercurrent of caution, reservation, or even guilt, potentially reflecting his awareness of deeper responsibilities or a conflict between impulse and duty.

• The T-Square involving the Ascendant, IC, and MC further reinforces internal tension. While his immediate reaction was one of surprise and a stirring of new possibilities (energized by Uranus and Mars), the configuration suggests that he quickly initiated an internal process of weighing these impulsive desires against established personal boundaries and obligations.

In conclusion, the chart indicates that Stefan’s true thoughts, feelings, and reactions were complex and layered. His inner world was stirred by a sudden, electrifying impulse of attraction and a break from routine, yet these impulses were immediately tempered by a reserved and cautious side that recalled his existing commitments or responsibilities. His reaction was real and emotionally charged, but it was also filtered through an internal mechanism that questioned the sudden disruption your presence imposed.

While his immediate reaction was one of surprise and a stirring of new possibilities (energized by Uranus and Mars), the configuration suggests that he quickly initiated an internal process of weighing these impulsive desires against established personal boundaries and obligations.

In conclusion, the chart indicates that Stefan’s true thoughts, feelings, and reactions were complex and layered. His inner world was stirred by a sudden, electrifying impulse of attraction and a break from routine, yet these impulses were immediately tempered by a reserved and cautious side that recalled his existing commitments or responsibilities. His reaction was real and emotionally charged, but it was also filtered through an internal mechanism that questioned the sudden disruption your presence imposed.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: What were Stefan's true thoughts, feelings, and reactions when I stepped off the S-Bahn the morning of September 20th, 2024? Stefan is represented here by the Ninth House, still indicates immediate unexpected reaction, filtered through his own internal reserves and recognition of his current situation.
